column1: #Text=Sooo , I 'm not very good at writing letters .
#Text=Beifong has me staking out the Red Monsoon hideout .
#Text=You wo n't believe what 's going down .
#Text=" Bolin says : " My dearest Avatar Korra .
#Text=Though several fortnights have passed since your departure to convalesce in the homeland of your tribesmen , I feel our friendship knows neither time ... nor distance .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You will be most pleased to learn that I found gainful employment with Sir Varrick and the Lady Kuvira .
#Text=I set off on the morrow with some trepidation , but I am eager to offer any aid I can in stabilizing the Earth Kingdom !
